attributes.action: Reverse the ban on corporal punishment in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the recent tragic events in Edlington, and the statistic that 25% of all teachers have been attacked by pupils, it is time to re-introduce discipline to schools through the reintroduction of corporal punishment. Corporal punishment should be made lawful (after proper due process), and encouraged when appropriate as a means of instilling discipline, respect, and in providing an effective sanction when none exists at present.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
